tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP LOVE) (S (VP (VBG watching) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN son) (NN play)) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ his) (NNS friends))) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN playground)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NN school)))))))) (. .)))
